description.value: Action Cost: 2 [Combat] actions Range: 30-foot radius centered on you Effect: All enemies within range who attacked an ally since your last turn take Fire damage equal to your Tier × 8. Each target makes [[/save type=reflex]] (Agility + Luck). Compare your Wisdom + Fire Mastery to their save successes. Net successes determine damage: Net 0 or less = No damage, Net 1 = Half damage (Tier × 4), Net 2+ = Full damage (Tier × 8). Damage Type: Fire (energy), Half DR Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
